{{Lang|'''Kaedehara Kazuha'''|ja={{Rubi|楓原|かえではら|万葉|かずは}}|ja_rm=Kaedehara Kazuha}}{{Name order|Japanese}} is a playable [[Anemo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

A wandering samurai of the once-famed [[Kaedehara Clan]], Kazuha is a temporary crewmember of [[The Crux]].
